data.title: Everything Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker have said about their relationship
data.meta_description: Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker were married in May 2022. They haven't been shy about publicly professing their love.
data.text:
This story is available exclusively to Business Insider subscribers. Become an Insider and start reading now. Have an account? .

Kourtney Kardashian Barker and Travis Barker were married in May 2022.

The couple has been public with many parts of their relationship on "The Kardashians" and online.

Here's everything that Barker and Kardashian Barker have said about their relationship.

Advertisement

Barker denied that he and Kardashian Barker were dating in March 2019.

In an interview with E! Insider in 2019, Barker said that he and Kardashian Barker weren't dating despite hanging out together.

"She's just a very dear friend," Barker said when asked about dating rumors.

Advertisement

In February 2021, Barker shared a note from Kardashian Barker on his Instagram story.

InStyle reported that Barker posted a note from his then-girlfriend on his Instagram story that read, "To lots of fun adventures, may we destroy each other completely."

It came after Barker had tweeted the same phrase — "May we destroy each other completely" — a week prior.

Advertisement

In March 2021, Barker said that it was nice dating someone who also had children.

Barker said during an appearance on "The Drew Barrymore Show" that he had found it difficult in the past dating women who didn't have children, and thus had "trouble understanding" his availability.

"I'm spending time with a woman who's like a great mom, who's a great friend, and I just, you don't have to worry about any of those things. It just comes natural. It's like a maturity thing," he said of Kardashian Barker.

Barker said that he also enjoys the feeling of "missing someone and cherishing the time that I spent with them," particularly at the beginning of a relationship.

Advertisement

Barker posted a shirtless photo with an NSFW caption in April 2021.

On April 10, 2021, Barker posted a photo of himself sitting at a drum kit outdoors without a shirt on.

"All day I dream about sex w/ you," the caption read.

Advertisement

Barker wished Kardashian Barker a happy birthday in April 2021.

On Kardashian Barker's birthday in April 2021, Barker posted a carousel of photos showing the pair being affectionate with each other.

"I FUCKING LOVE YOU!" Barker wrote in the caption. "YOU'RE A BLESSING TO THIS WORLD HAPPY BIRTHDAY @kourtneykardash."

Advertisement

Kardashian Barker and Barker posted romantic photos of a Utah trip in April 2021.

Kardashian Barker shared a photo of Barker holding her up and kissing her, while she wore a bikini. As Insider previously reported, the couple was on a trip to Utah's Amangiri Resort.

"Just Like Heaven," the caption read.

Barker posted a carousel of photos of the trip as well, accompanied by the caption, "Anywhere with you."

Advertisement

Barker said he could do 'anything' with Kardashian Barker after flying for the first time since 2008 in August 2021.

In 2008, Barker was involved in a deadly plane crash that left four passengers dead and him in critical condition after being taken to a burn center in Georgia, People reported.

In August 2021, he flew for the first time since the accident, posting a photo showing him kissing Kardashian in front of a plane.

"With you anything is possible," he wrote in the post's caption.

Barker shared a carousel of photos from his and Kardashian Barker's September 2021 Paris trip.

In the caption of the post, which showed him and his then-girlfriend kissing in front of the illuminated Eiffel Tower and on a carousel, Barker wrote that "forever isn't long enough."

Advertisement

Kardashian Barker said in a March 2022 teaser that she and Barker wanted to have a child.

In a teaser for the first season of "The Kardashians," Kardashian Barker expressed her and Barker's desire to have a child.

"Travis and I want to have a baby," she said in the teaser.

Advertisement

Kardashian Barker called her husband a 'handsome king' after they were married in Las Vegas in early 2022.

In one of their many weddings (this one without a marriage license and in a Las Vegas chapel), Kardashian Barker and Barker were wed by an Elvis impersonator. In an Instagram post featuring photos of the event, Kardashian Barker reminisced about the event.

"Once upon a time in a land far, far away (Las Vegas) at 2am, after an epic night and a little tequila, a queen and her handsome king ventured out to the only open chapel with an Elvis and got married (with no license)," she wrote in the April 2022 post. "Practice makes perfect."

Advertisement

Kardashian Barker said that she wished her children had been present to celebrate Barker's proposal.

In season one, episode four of "The Kardashians," Kardashian Barker called her children to tell them that she was engaged to Barker. One of them, Penelope, hung up on her.

"I do wish that my kids were here," Kardashian Barker said during a confessional. "I think it would have made them feel more included in the decision, kind of, and part of the surprise. I know that my mom made that decision, and it probably wasn't her best."

Advertisement

Kardashian Barker said that Barker once asked her to marry him 'once a month.'

In the season one finale of "The Kardashians" in June 2022, Kardashian Barker spoke with her mother Kris Jenner about Barker's proposal.

"Mom, Travis asked me if I would marry him once a month for the next year," she said.

"Like, we just have a celebration of weddings," Barker explained to Jenner.

Advertisement

Barker posted Father's Day cards that Kardashian Barker's children made for him in June 2022.

In several Instagram story posts, Barker showed the cards that Penelope and Reign Disick, Kardashian Barker's youngest children with ex Scott Disick, had made for him on Father's Day.

"You are so so nice and kind you are so amazing," a card signed with Penelope's name read. "You are the beast you are the beast drummer ever you make my mom happy!"

Advertisement

Kardashian Barker said she was 'grateful to God' as Barker recovered from pancreatitis.

Barker was hospitalized for pancreatitis in June 2022, and he and his wife spoke publicly about it in early July.

"I am so grateful to God for healing my husband, for all of your prayers for him and for us, for the overwhelming outpouring of love and support," she wrote on her Instagram story, Insider reported. "I am so touched and appreciative. I am so so thankful to our specialists, doctors, and nurses at Cedars Sinai for taking such wonderful care of my husband and me during our stay."

Advertisement

Kardashian Barker also condemned paparazzi actions around the incident.

In the days that followed, Kardashian Barker called out paparazzi in an Instagram story post, per screenshots preserved by the Instagram account @kardashiansocial.

"To the paparazzi who sold pictures of me 'out and about' while my husband was in the hospital fighting for his life…these were photos actually taken weeks ago," she wrote in the post. "I didn't forget about you. A new level of low, monetizing off of our nightmare. Really savagely uncool when I actually didn't leave his side…shame on you."

Advertisement

Kardashian Barker said that her favorite tattoos of Barker's were related to her.

Kardashian Barker told "Today" host Hoda Kotb in September 2022 that her favorite tattoo on Barker's body was the one of her name on his chest.

At the time, he had two other tattoos related to her: one of her lips, and one that she personally tattooed that reads "I love you" in her handwriting.

Later, he got a tattoo of a pair of eyes that appear to match Kardashian Barker's.

Advertisement

Kardashian Barker said on 'The Kardashians' that she and Barker take advantage of being away from their kids.

Kardashian Barker told her mother Kris Jenner in season two, episode two of "The Kardashians" that she did the dishes "butt naked" while staying with Barker in their Palm Springs home.

When Jenner asked why, Kardashian Barker replied that "at home, we have six kids and we don't… you know, we sleep with clothes on."

In a confessional, however, she said that she knew that she needed to do the dishes before the filming crew came by, and "happened to be naked" when she walked by the sink.

Advertisement

Advertisement

That same month, she reminisced about her Vegas wedding, saying the officiant kept calling her by the wrong name.

Kardashian said in season two, episode six of "The Kardashians" that the Elvis impersonator who officiated her wedding kept referring to her by her sister's name.

"When Elvis was marrying us, he's like, 'I, Khloé, take thee, Travis,' and I just like lost my mind, fell straight on the floor, and we like couldn't get up," she said during a confessional.

Advertisement

Barker said that he's not shy about sharing their fertility journey on television.

In an interview with GQ, Barker spoke about "The Kardashians" tracking his and Kardashian Barker's efforts to conceive a child together through fertility treatments.

"I don't care if I'm cumming in a cup, or whatever," Barker said. "It's real life. And if any of that can help people, seeing Kourtney's journey through IVF, which is super hard for a woman. You saw her struggle with it and talk about it. That's real."

Advertisement

Barker said that he agreed to his proposal being filmed so long as they didn't see 'one camera.'

Barker's proposal appeared in season one, episode four of "The Kardashians" in addition to the ensuing celebration. Barker told GQ that Kris Jenner was the one who requested that their proposal be filmed.

"I can't see one camera, and Kourtney cannot see one camera," Barker told GQ.

Advertisement

Kardashian Barker said that she and Barker both feel 'guilty' being away from their children.

In season two, episode seven of "The Kardashians," Kardashian Barker said that she and Barker had similar feelings about being away from their children.

"We're both really similar and get like, this guilty feeling, but we shortened it up as much as we can," Kardashian Barker said of the couple's trip to Italy and New York.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Kardashian said her and Barker's Met Gala 2022 looks represented their relationship.

The couple wore matching Thom Browne suits for the Met Gala. During the fitting, shown on "The Kardashians" season two, episode eight, Kardashian Barker said the outfits reflected their relationship.

"Our looks work together, which is like, how we feel at this stage in our lives," Kardashian Barker said in a confessional.

"It's like a conversation piece, then you put the two together. Without it, I would be like, 'I don't know,'" he said during the fitting.

Advertisement

The couple gushed on their first married Valentine's Day in 2023.

On Valentine's Day, Barker posted a series of photos with his wife on Instagram, writing, "First Valentine's Day with you as my wife. I love you."

"First Valentine's Day with my husband," Kardashian Barker replied in the comments. "My forever Valentine."

Read next

Advertisement
